response.original_title: Celebrity Train Layouts Part 3: Mandy Patinkin
response.overview: Describes Mandy Patinkin's train layout which features a freight yard, mountains, animated carnival, operating ski lift, scale structures, and parallel mainlines with sweeping curves. Mandy operates a mix of Lionel's Modern Era, including the 2343 Santa Fe F3 re-issue from 1996, Amtrak GG1, 490 C & O Hudson, Illinois Central 8580 F3 passenger set from 1985, and a 2380 NYC Geep.
response.title: Celebrity Train Layouts Part 3: Mandy Patinkin
